title: Quick Tab Storage Location v1.6.0.12+
details:
Since v1.6.0.12, Quick Tab state is stored in browser.storage.local (not storage.sync) to avoid quota errors. The storage key is 'quick_tabs_state_v2'. When clearing Quick Tab storage from popup.js:
1. Must clear from storage.local (primary)
2. Should also clear storage.sync for backward compatibility
3. Must send RESET_GLOBAL_QUICK_TAB_STATE to background to reset globalQuickTabState cache
4. Must send CLEAR_ALL_QUICK_TABS to content scripts to destroy DOM elements
The background script handler resets globalQuickTabState.tabs = [], globalQuickTabState.lastUpdate, and lastBroadcastedStateHash.
